name: Orbital Nuclear All-Stars
description:
Orbital Nuclear All-Stars puts you in the driver seat of a fast-paced race around a planet! Race against an AI opponent or your fastest ghost as you boost to extreme speeds in this 3D space racing game. Be careful though: The faster you go, the higher the risk of damage if you hit an obstacle.

Created by a team of 4 - Team Indecisive at MSU for MI455 SS 2021.
